description:
In this course you will learn what you need to know to have the confidence and expertise to find, analyze, purchase, and manage your multi-unit property for consistent residual income. No experience required

The course includes Video Lectures, Lecture Outlines, and Section Study Material to help students retain concepts learned.

The material is arranged sequentially and covers the entire buying process from the preparation work needed to get your mindset right for investing to the actual buying process, and lastly to managing the property

The course is from the point of view of the beginner who has a strong desire to invest in real estate but lacks knowledge or funding to get started or expand investing portfolio
title: Income Property Investing Baby Steps
